00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00040 std::string TShapeSize2DB2::get_name() const
00041   { return "TShapeSize2DB2"; }
00042 
00043 TShapeSize2DB2::~TShapeSize2DB2() {}
00044 
00045 bool TShapeSize2DB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00046                                double& result, 
00047                                MsqError&  )
00048 {
00049   const double two_det = 2.0 * det(T);
00050   if (invalid_determinant(two_det)) { // barrier
00051     result = 0.0;
00052     return false;
00053   }
00054     
00055   const double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00056   result = (frob_sqr - 2.0 * sqrt( frob_sqr + two_det ) + 2.0)/two_det;
00057   return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool TShapeSize2DB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00061                                          double& result, 
00062                                          MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00063                                          MsqError& err )
00064 {
00065   const double d = det(T);
00066   if (invalid_determinant(d)) { // barrier
00067     result = 0.0;
00068     return false;
00069   }
00070   const double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00071   const double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00072   const double v = frob_sqr - 2.0 * psi + 2.0;
00073   result = v / (2*d);
00074 
00075     // deriv of V wrt T
00076   MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00077   MsqMatrix<2,2> v_wrt_T(T);
00078   v_wrt_T *= (1.0 - 1.0/psi);
00079   v_wrt_T -= 1.0/psi * adjt;
00080   v_wrt_T *= 2;
00081   
00082     // deriv of mu wrt T
00083   deriv_wrt_T = v_wrt_T;
00084   deriv_wrt_T *= 0.5/d;
00085   deriv_wrt_T -= v / (2*d*d) * adjt;
00086   
00087   return true;
00088 }
00089 
00090 bool TShapeSize2DB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00091                                          double& result, 
00092                                          MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00093                                          MsqMatrix<2,2> second[3],
00094                                          MsqError& err )
00095 {
00096   const double d = det(T);
00097   if (invalid_determinant(d)) { // barrier
00098     result = 0.0;
00099     return false;
00100   }
00101   const double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00102   const double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00103   const double v = frob_sqr - 2.0 * psi + 2.0;
00104   result = v / (2*d);
00105 
00106     // deriv of V wrt T
00107   MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00108   MsqMatrix<2,2> v_wrt_T(T);
00109   v_wrt_T *= (1.0 - 1.0/psi);
00110   v_wrt_T -= 1.0/psi * adjt;
00111   v_wrt_T *= 2;
00112   
00113     // deriv of mu wrt T
00114   deriv_wrt_T = v_wrt_T;
00115   deriv_wrt_T *= 0.5/d;
00116   deriv_wrt_T -= v / (2*d*d) * adjt;
00117   
00118     // second of V wrt T 
00119   const double s = T(0,1) - T(1,0);
00120   const double tr = trace(T);
00121   const double f = -2.0/(psi*psi*psi);
00122   second[0](0,0) = second[1](0,1) = second[2](1,1) =  f*s*s;
00123   second[0](0,1) = second[0](1,0) = second[1](1,1) = -f*s*tr;
00124   second[1](0,0) = second[2](0,1) = second[2](1,0) =  f*s*tr;
00125   second[0](1,1) = second[2](0,0) = -(second[1](1,0) = -f*tr*tr);
00126   pluseq_scaled_I( second, 2 );
00127   
00128     // second of mu wrt T 
00129   const double x = 1.0/(2*d);
00130   second[0] *= x;
00131   second[1] *= x;
00132   second[2] *= x;
00133   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, v/(-2*d*d) );
00134   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, v/(d*d*d), adjt );
00135   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -1/(2*d*d), v_wrt_T, adjt );
00136   
00137   return true;
00138 }
